parameters.name: reporting_feeds
parameters.label: Reporting Feeds:
parameters.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend ReportingFeeds=parse_json(Description)['ReportingFeeds']
| where isnotnull(ReportingFeeds)
| mv-expand ReportingFeeds
| summarize by tostring(ReportingFeeds)
| order by ReportingFeeds asc

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| summarize Count=count(), Title='Total Indicators'

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == 'High' or ConfidenceScore == 85
| summarize Count=count(), Title='Total High Severity'

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == 'Medium' or ConfidenceScore == 50
| summarize Count=count(), Title='Total Medium Severity'

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == 'Low' or ConfidenceScore == 15
| summarize Count=count(), Title='Total Low Severity'

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
| summarize CountOfIndicators=count() by IndicatorType
content.title: Total Indicators by Type

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Active, Enrichment, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(Enrichment), Source = SourceSystem
| summarize Count=count(), Title='Total Matched Indicators'

let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Enrichment, Active, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), IndicatorType, SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(Enrichment), IndicatorType, Source = SourceSystem
| summarize CountOfIndicators=count() by IndicatorType
content.title: Total Matched Indicators by Type

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| extend Severity=iif(Enrichment['Severity'] == 'High' or ConfidenceScore == 85, "High",
                        iff(Enrichment['Severity'] == 'Medium' or ConfidenceScore == 50, "Medium",
                        iff(Enrichment['Severity'] == 'Low' or ConfidenceScore == 15, "Low",
                        'Other')))
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Enrichment, Active, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), Severity, SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(Enrichment), Severity, Source = SourceSystem
| summarize Count=count() by Severity
content.title: Total Matched Indicators by Severity

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| extend Tags=set_union(Enrichment['UserTags'],Enrichment['SystemTags'])
| mvexpand Tags
| where isnotnull(Tags)
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Active, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), Tags, SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(Tags), Source = SourceSystem
| summarize Count=count() by Tag=tostring(Tags)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Tags Linked with Matched Indicators

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment = parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| extend Malwares= Enrichment['Malwares']
| where isnotnull(Malwares)
| mvexpand Malwares
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Active, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), Malwares, SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(Malwares), Source = SourceSystem
| summarize Count=count() by Malware=tostring(Malwares)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Malwares Linked with Matched Indicators

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment = parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| extend ThreatActors=Enrichment['ThreatActors']
| where isnotnull(ThreatActors)
| mvexpand ThreatActors
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Active, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), ThreatActors, SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, tostring(ThreatActors), Source = SourceSystem
| summarize Count=count() by ThreatActor=tostring(ThreatActors)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Threat Actors Linked with Matched Indicators
